 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַקּוֺ‎</span> **noun masculine** ==wild goat== (?) only [[Deut.14.5|Deut 14:5]] in list of clean animals <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָזָ֑מֶר אַיָּל וּצְבִי וְיַחְמוּר וְאַקּוֺ וְדִישׁוֺן וּתְאוֺ‎</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὄρυξ</span>, [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***ibex***; compare [[BDB#Bo|Bo]]<sup>Hieroz. i. 900 f.</sup>, [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנק‎</span> compare [[BDB#MV|MV]], with reference to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***goat***; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare also Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִיקָא‎</span>, but [[BDB#Levy|NHWB]] [[BDB#MV|MV]] refer this to <span class="bdbLangGreek">αἴξ</span>). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺר‎</span>, for Amos [[Deut.8.8|Deut 8:8]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְאֹר‎</span>.
